divs: sighting detailsthis morning was very overcast, 100% cloud cover, not "fluffy" cloud, very uniform. i am working on a new building which is at the 5th floor level, to set up work for tomorrow i was checking the location of a surveyors axis line, actually sighting along the line, i was looking due east towards long island, when i noticed what appeared to be a kite floating in the sky, what interested me was there was no wind this morning... nothing.. still, la guardia airport is roughly north east of the site, a twin engined passenger flew diagionly by at about that time, that the first clue i had as to the scale of the object i was observing, now i am curious, the object was approx 2\3 the wing span of the jet. the was some beetween a 1\2 mile to a mile distant, the object appeared to be well past the jet, due to the greyness of the whole sky it was very diffuclt to make any kind of estimate of distances, but i have watched aircraft on that flight path recently and judjed by that. some thing else about object was that it opaque, and faded completly, from time to time into the backround, my first thoughts wre this might be some kind of military secret aircraft on a test run or something, being between two international airports it would be "discovered" thereby proving or disproving the object capability of stealth or something, this whole thing went on for 15 to 20 minutes, also it changed shape from parashute shape to plaice (the flat fish) to disk depending on the objects movement, i drew some sketches shortly afterwards, send a fax # i will forward the page. to say the least i was stunned and also the object moved east\west and up and with real smooth movement. one other thing a helocopter flew from south of the objects location, it looked (heilo) minute in relation to the object at first, the was helocopter flew in my direction it too 2 to 2 1\2 minutes for it to pass me, i dont know how fast helocopters fly' again cant estimate distant, and the object was behind the helo. i have no clue what i observed, this is not a figment of my imagination. i dont have a scanner but i do have a sketch with notes
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around October 6th 2008
Summary: Disk like objects over brooklyn at 9am
